org.svvrl.goal.core.util

Interface Semiring<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of elements in a semiring
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransitionMonoid.ValueSemiring

    public interface Semiring<T>
    This interface defines a semiring (R, +, *, 0, 1) where R is a set of elements, + (plus) is a binary operation, * (multiplication) is a binary operation, 0 is the identity of +, and 1 is the identity of *. Note that the following semiring properties are not guaranteed by this interface.
    • (a + b) + c = a + (b + c)
    • 0 + a = a + 0 = a
    • a + b = b + a
    • (a * b) * c = a * (b * c)
    • 1 * a = a * 1 = a
    • a * (b + c) = (a * b) + (a * c)
    • (a + b) * c = (a * c) + (b * c)
    • 0 * a = a * 0 = 0
    Author:
    "Ming-Hsien Tsai"

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Returns the identity of the multiplication operation.
      T getZero()
      Returns the identity of the plus operation.
      T multiply(T e1, T e2)
      Returns a value that is the multiplication of two elements.
      T plus(T e1, T e2)
      Returns a value that is the addition of two elements.
